features: The first Citra Citrus Sippers were made out of wax that was poured into a wood mold. Then peppermint was added so you could eat the sipper after using it to drink the juice. Later versions removed the flavoring and were made out of wood, then porcelain, and finally today plastic.

Brand:Citra Model:Citra sipper Color:Multi-Color These Citra Citrus Sippers are a true American original, and are still manufactured in the USA. They were invented by Charles Schiller (a citrus grower), and first introduced at the 1933-34 Chicago World's Fair. Used like a straw, the citrus sipper allows you to drink the juice straight from an orange, grapefruit or other applicable fruit. It's also considered the World's Smallest Juicer.
